title: Kylie Jenner shows off her TINY waist in leather dress
text:
Her sister Kim Kardashian squeezed into a custom corset for the Met Gala.

But Kylie Jenner didn't need the help of a costumier to look svelte, showing off her sculpted figure in a black leather dress on Tuesday.

Captioning the new Tuesday shots 'can't resist', the 22-year-old make-up mogul sat on a bench, highlighting her hour glass frame.

Strike a pose: Kylie Jenner shows off TINY waist in leather dress on Instagram on Tuesday... as Kardashian family 'want her to reunite with Stormi's dad Travis Scott'

She stared straight at the camera, her long black hair worn loose over her shoulders.

The images come as it emerged that Kylie's Kardashian family were keen for her to reunite with her ex, Travis Scott.

'Her family wants them to be together,' a source told People magazine. 'Travis might not be perfect, but he's a great partner and dad.

'Everyone would be upset if Kylie can't figure things out with Travis.'

'Can't resist': The 22-year-old make-up mogul sat on a bench, highlighting her hour glass frame

The two regularly meet up with 20-month-old daughter Stormi

'They're a great team,' the source continued. 'And it's a good sign that they still enjoy hanging out.'

The 22-year-old make-up mogul and the 28-year-old rapper recently ended their two-and-a-half year relationship.

Stormi lives with Kylie, while her dad tours the U.S., however he regularly checks in and spends one-on-one time with her.

Anything Kim can do: On Sunday's Keeping Up With The Kardashians we saw Kylie's big sister squeeze into a custom corset for the Met Gala

Meanwhile, it was recently claimed that part of the reason Travis and Kylie decided to call off their romance was over differing views on whether or not to expand their family.

A source previously said: '[Kylie] wanted to have a second baby [but Travis] did not.'

Keeping Up with the Kardashians star Kylie recently took to social media to insist her and Travis are on 'great terms' following their split.

Back together? Travis Scott is seen with Kylie and daughter Stormi in August; her family think the two still have a future together

Taking to her Twitter account, the reality TV star said: 'Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi !! our friendship and our daughter is priority.

Meanwhile Travis badly injured his knee during his performance at Rolling Loud in New York on Saturday - but continued the show like a pro.

The Astroworld rapper took a nasty fall on stage at the festival at Citi Field in Queens on Saturday and he admitted on stage he thought he had broken his knee. However, he wasn't going to let the painful injury get in his way of finishing the set.

'Mom's night out': On Monday evening Kylie hit the town with friends

What a ride: The group travelled in Kylie's custom Rolls Royce

He told the crowd: 'I ain't gonna lie, I think I just broke my knee right now. But this show cannot stop just yet.'

The hip-hop superstar was seen hopping along as he continued his last song, fan-favourite Sicko Mode, in footage from the show shared on social media by fans.

Meanwhile, Travis performed his latest single Highest In The Room, which features some lyrics which fans believe is referencing his relationship woes with ex-girlfriend Kylie Jenner, at the gig.

He raps: 'She saw my eyes, she know I'm gone / I see some things that you might fear / I'm doing a show, I'll be back soon / That ain't what she wanna hear.' (sic)'
description: Her sister Kim Kardashian squeezed into a custom corset for the Met Gala.
